IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: WOODLAWN COMMONS IS A COMMUNITY OF INDEPENDENT AND ENRICHED HOUSING WITH AN EMPHASIS ON MAINTAINING THAT INDEPENDENCE THROUGHOUT THE AGING PROCESS.WOODLAWN COMMONS PROVIDES A SUPPORTIVE ENVIRONMENT THAT CAN BE TAILORED TO MEET A RESIDENT'S PERSONAL NEEDS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: WOODLAWN COMMONS IS A COMMUNITY OF INDEPENDENT AND ENRICHED HOUSING WITH AN EMPHASIS ON MAINTAINING THAT INDEPENDENCE THROUGHOUT THE AGING PROCESS.WOODLAWN COMMONS PROVIDES A SUPPORTIVE ENVIRONMENT THAT CAN BE TAILORED TO MEET A RESIDENT'S PERSONAL NEEDS.
IRS990.Description: 60 INDEPENDENT UNITS AND 40 ENRICHED HOUSING UNITS WERE PROVIDED TO APPROXIMATELY 125 SENIORS DURING 2010.THE WESLEY COMMUNITY AS A WHOLE HAS EMBRACED A PHILANTHROPIC CULTURE. ON BEHALF OF THE WESLEY COMMUNITY, MANAGEMENT DONATES OVER 750 HOURS PER YEAR OF THEIR OWN TIME TO LOCAL ORGANIZATIONS TO FURTHER SUPPORT THE NOT-FOR-PROFIT NEEDS IN OUR COMMUNITY. WE HAVE STAFF MEMBERS REGULARLY CONTRIBUTING THEIR OWN TIME TO THE ALZHEIMER'S ASSOCIATION, THE SARATOGA PLANNING BOARD, SARATOGA ARTSFEST, THE SARATOGA SPRINGS LIONS CLUB AND THE SARATOGA SPRINGS CHAMBER OF COMMERCE, TO NAME A FEW. ADDITIONALLY, THE WESLEY CAMPUS REGULARLY HOSTS THE ACTIVITIES AND MEETINGS OF OVER 15 NOT-FOR-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS.

Activity2.Description: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES THREE MEALS PER DAY FOR APPROXIMATELY 22,000 ENRICHED HOUSING RESIDENT DAYS. THE DINING ROOM ALSO SERVES MEALS TO INDEPENDENT RESIDENTS, RESIDENT FAMILIES AND STAFF AT REGULAR MENU PRICES.

Activity3.Description: HOUSEKEEPING SERVICES ARE PROVIDED TO ALL 40 ENRICHED HOUSING UNITS AS PART OF THEIR MONTHLY RENT. INDEPENDENT RESIDENTS MAY PURCHASE HOUSEKEEPING SERVICES FOR A NOMINAL FEE AS NEEDED.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Part XII, Line 4b: Other revenue amounts included on 990 but not included in F/S
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: NET INVESTMENT INCOME $196286 LOSS ON FIXED ASSET DISPOSALS $-2954

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. THIS IS DISCLOSED ON OUR WEBSITE: WWW.WESLEYHEALTH.COM

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: AN INDEPENDENT SALARY SURVEY IS COMPLETED AT LEAST EVERY 3 YEARS. THE SURVEY IS INITIATED BY THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD. THE SURVEY INCLUDES COMPARABILITY DATA AND IS USED TO ARRIVE AT AN ACCEPTABLE SALARY FOR OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: IT IS THE POLICY OF THE ORGANIZATION TO REQUIRE OFFICERS, DIRECTORS OR TRUSTEES AND KEY EMPLOYEES TO DISCLOSE ANNUALLY INTERESTS THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO CONFLICTS. IT IS A DUTY OF THE CORPORATE COMPLIANCE OFFICER TO REGULARLY AND CONSISTENTLY MONITOR AND AND ENFORCE COMPLIANCE WITH THE POLICY. DISCLOSURES BY OFFICERS, DIRECTORS OR TRUSTEES AND KEY EMPLOYEES ARE COMPLETED ANNUALLY.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11: Form 990 Review Process
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A COPY OF THE COMPLETED FORM 990 IN DRAFT FORM IS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE. AT THE DISCRETION OF THE BOARD, THE FINANCE COMMITTEE MAY REVIEW THE 990 AND PRESENT FINDINGS TO THE BOARD AS A WHOLE. QUESTIONS AND COMMENTS ARE REVIEWED BY THE CFO AND ADDRESSED AS APPROPRIATE, DISCREPANCIES BETWEEN THE BOARD AND THE CFO WILL BE RESOLVED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE. UPON APPROVAL BY THE BOARD AND THE FINANCE COMMITTEE, THE FINAL FORM 990 WILL BE FILED WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part III, Line 4d : Other Program Services Description
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 4: IN 2010, WOODLAWN WAS ABLE TO NEGOTIATE PREFERABLE RATES WITH CABLE AND TELEPHONE COMPANIES. THIS ALLOWED WOODLAWN TO OFFER LOWER THAN MARKET COST TELEPHONE AND CABLE TO ITS RESIDENTS.

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: SOCIAL MODEL DAY CARE SERVICES FOR SENIORS
FUNDRAISING CORPORATION OF THE WESLEY COMMUNITY
